    Methods in org.apache.sis.util.logging that return MonolineFormatter
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static MonolineFormatter
    MonolineFormatter.install()
    Installs a MonolineFormatter for the root logger, or returns the existing instance if any.
    static MonolineFormatter
    MonolineFormatter.install(Logger logger, Level level)
    Installs a MonolineFormatter for the specified logger, or returns the existing instance if any.
